module.uhcrun.animal_cooked_food.descrip: Many animals drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhcrun.blasted_ores.description: All ores get automatically smelt, doubled and bring more experience
module.uhcrun.leaves_leave_no_leaves.des: All leaves only drop apples in larger quantities
module.uhcrun.mob_cooked_food.descriptio: Many mobs drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhcrun.need_for_resources.descrip: All stones types drop cobblestone, gravel drop arrows, sand drop glass, cactus/kelp drop planks, dead bushes drop bread, mushrooms drop stews and more entities drop leather
module.uhcrun.ore_balance.description: Lapis, gold and diamond ores are more frequent and can be found at any level
module.uhcrun.timberman.description: Trees get cut instantly and drop oak planks
